embeds.title: Order Accepted
embeds.description:
The order has been accepted and is now awaiting payment. Please pay for the order as soon as possible; once paid, the freelancer may begin work.

The amount that is due:

# `{{ amount }}`
This amount is being held by AMOX in escrow until the order has been fulfilled by the freelancer.
